title: New: Young Montana? – (ina)whurl(d)
body:
After several months of having to endure the torment of only one ipod earphone working, it’s rather fitting that on the day I splash out on a snazzy pair of Sennheiser’s, both **Gold Panda** and **Young Montana?** drop new tracks.

Two of the finest producers when it comes to visualizing intricate, vivid soundscapes, as **Gold Panda’s** [Trust](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/17747-new-gold-panda-trust/) showed earlier and **Young Montana?’s** new joint _(ina)whurl(d)_ is yet another reminder of just how talented the Birmingham based musician is. Funky synth lines and progressive percussion sections intertwine gloriously, creating a track that’s entertaining and thoroughly engrossing. Check it out below.
